thread.title_full: Ground News - Trump calls Orban a “fantastic leader”

author: ZN.UA
title: Ground News - Trump calls Orban a “fantastic leader”
text: Former US President Donald Trump called Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban a “fantastic leader”, ironizing over criticism of his self-generated illiberal stubbornness. This is what Bloomberg writes. Orban does not raise disputes, because he says: “It will be so” and everything is rooted in this. Oh boss. He's not a great leader, a fantastic leader,” Trump said. This is what Bloomberg writes. Orban does not raise disputes, because he says: “It will be so” and everything is rooted in this. Oh boss. He's not a great leader, a fantastic leader,” Trump said.
